text.autoconfig.fasterminecarts.title: Faster Minecarts
text.autoconfig.fasterminecarts.option.a: Enable automatic slowdown to prevent derailing at corners.
text.autoconfig.fasterminecarts.option.m: Enable manual slowdown on soul sand blocks or slime blocks.
text.autoconfig.fasterminecarts.option.s: Enable automatic slowdown for hopper and chest minecarts on hopper entities.
text.autoconfig.fasterminecarts.option.m: Change the maximum speed (in meters per second).
Vanilla value is 8, default value is 24.
